name: GivenIAmOnXPayOpzioni1Page
description: Successfully pass Anagrafica1 and Anagrafica2 pages
aliases: Given I am on XPay Opzioni1 page
children: When I click on element XPayHeader.ActivateNowButton
Then XPay Anagrafica1 Page is open
When I select a shop from dropdown for a specific company
When I click on element SubmitButton
Then XPay Anagrafica2 Page is open
When I click on element SubmitButton
Then XPay Opzioni1 Services Page is open
